mapper.select: SELECT item_user, review1_user, review2_user, review2_score FROM apply, review1, review2 WHERE apply.item_id = review1.item_id AND apply.item_id = review2.item_id AND apply.item_id = #{item_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO publicity(item_id, item_user, review1_user, review2_user, review2_score) VALUES(#{item_id}, #{item_user}, #{review1_user}, #{review2_user}, #{review2_score})
